name.jp: 使い捨てサンタのソリ

description.en: This board will be gone after you use it one time. Make sure you get where you are going!
description.ar: This board will be gone after you use it one time. Make sure you get where you are going!
description.br: Esta prancha desaparecerá depois de você usá-la uma vez. Certifique-se de chegar aonde está indo! Velocidade Máxima: 44 km/h.
description.cns: 等级1级可用，使用后消失，无法存取仓库、交易与丢弃
description.fi: This board will be gone after you use it one time. Make sure you get where you are going!
description.fil: This board will be gone after you use it one time. Make sure you get where you are going!
description.fr: Traîneau magique volant tiré par un Lawolf utilisable une seule fois (44 km/h).
description.id: This board will be gone after you use it one time. Make sure you get where you are going!
description.it: This board will be gone after you use it one time. Make sure you get where you are going!
description.jp: このボードは使い捨てタイプです。目的地まで下りずに飛んでいこう！ 最高速度: 44km/h
description.kr: 이 보드는 한 번 사용하면 사라집니다. 당신이가는 곳을 확인하십시오! 최고 속도 : 44km/h.
description.nl: This board will be gone after you use it one time. Make sure you get where you are going!
description.pl: This board will be gone after you use it one time. Make sure you get where you are going!
description.ru: Одноразовая доска. Удостоверьтесь, что не потратите на глупости! Максимальная скорость: 44 км/ч.
description.sp: Esta tabla desaparecerá después de usarla. ¡Asegúrate de llegar a donde vas! Velocidad Máxima: 44 km/h.
description.sw: This board will be gone after you use it one time. Make sure you get where you are going!
description.th: This board will be gone after you use it one time. Make sure you get where you are going!
description.tw: 使用後消失，確保你到達你要去的地方！最大飛行速度：44 km/h
